description: Frictionless Blocking from Dashboard - Enable single-click blocking from table rows and modal without confirmation dialogs

userStories.title: Add block button to dashboard table rows
userStories.description: As a user, I want to block items directly from the dashboard table so that I don't have to open the modal for every item I want to hide.
acceptanceCriteria: Block button (ban icon) appears on each row in ItemsTable component
Button is styled consistently with existing favorite toggle button (variant='ghost', size='icon')
Button is visible without hovering (always shown)
Clicking the button calls toggleBlocked(item.id) immediately (no confirmation)
Item row disappears immediately after blocking
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Remove confirmation dialog from modal blocking
userStories.description: As a user, I want to block items from the modal with a single click so that the process is fast and frictionless.
acceptanceCriteria: Ban icon in ItemDetailModal blocks immediately on click
Remove inline confirmation UI (the div with 'Block this item?' text and Confirm/Cancel buttons)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Close modal after blocking
userStories.description: As a user, I want the modal to close automatically after I block an item so that I can continue browsing the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal closes immediately after block button is clicked
Ban icon onClick handler calls toggleBlocked(item.id) then onClose()
No visual glitches or flash before modal closes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
